item.title: Getting started with phonegap-build
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting phonegap-build set up or installed.

item.title: Project Structure
item.description: This section provides details of how to organize the files and folders for a phonegap-build project, along with a brief description of each file and folder. It must focus on the files & folders that are uploaded to the phonegap-build service. It should be updated whenever there is any change in the phonegap-build service to reflect the current requirements. However, if the current phonegap-build service supports some variations, they should be all listed.
